SBC_MotoDriver3.Stepper: Based on the speed and the max amount of steps. Decide the direction in which the stepper motor is supposed to turn
SBC_MotoDriver3.StepperSpeed: Set the speed and the max amount of steps for the stepper motor
SBC_MotoDriver3.fadeIn: Fade a single channel to a specified value over a specified time
SBC_MotoDriver3.fadeOut: Fade a single channel to a specified value over a specified time
SBC_MotoDriver3.initSBC_MotoDriver3: Changing the I2C address and enable pin based on user input
SBC_MotoDriver3.ledStatus:
Read the status of the specified channels
0 = off
1 = on
2 = pwm
SBC_MotoDriver3.off: Turn off a single channel (accepts values between 0 and 7)
SBC_MotoDriver3.on: Turn on a single channel (accepts values between 0 and 7)
SBC_MotoDriver3.pwm: Write a specified value to a specified channel
SBC_MotoDriver3.pwmStatus: Read the current pwm value on the given pin
